alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kipahulu; Koolau Windward; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 19 at 3:14PM HST until December 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND... .A slowly falling northeast swell, along with strong trades, supports extending the High Surf Advisory for most east-facing shores through tonight, before falling below on Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf 7 to 10 feet. * WHERE...Kauai East, Koolau Windward, Olomana, Molokai Windward, Molokai Southeast, Windward Haleakala, Kipahulu, Big Island East and Big Island North. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
